mapper.insert: insert into tb_product (code, name, price, company_id, info, spec, insert_date, insert_timestamp, amount, inventory_amount, image_url, thumbnail_url, classification1, classification2, classification3, classification4) values(#{code}, #{name}, #{price}, #{companyId}, #{info}, #{spec}, (select now()), (select UNIX_TIMESTAMP()), #{amount}, #{amount}, #{imageUrl}, #{thumbnailUrl}, #{classification1}, #{classification2}, #{classification3}, #{classification4})

insert into tb_product_selling (code, company_id, selling_amount, start_date, start_timestamp, end_date, end_timestamp) values(#{code}, #{companyId}, #{sellingAmount}, (SELECT FROM_UNIXTIME(#{startTimestamp},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')), #{startTimestamp}, (SELECT FROM_UNIXTIME(#{endTimestamp},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')), #{endTimestamp})
mapper.update: update tb_product SET tb_product.inventory_amount = tb_product.inventory_amount + (#{changedInventoryAmount}) where 1=1 AND code = #{code}
mapper.select: select acode code1, name from tb_product_acode order by acode asc
select acode code1, bcode code2, name from tb_product_bcode WHERE acode = #{code1} order by acode, bcode asc
